title: v2.3.2 is here
content:
Enhancements:
  - Symmetry lines are now able to work with both on and in-between pixels
  - Symmetry line's thickness can scale with the canvas
  - Text tool can use font installed by other apps
  - Text tool can import font
  - A new button to select all frames
  - File preview now also displays canvas size

Fixes:
  - Contour brush sometimes doesn't work with pixel-perfect
  - Cut also removes underneath content when the move tool is active
  - Copy/cut sometimes doesn't get the correct content
